name: PowerPlant Powerbank
details:
Mobile 10000 mAH Powerbank for Effect DevicesCapacity: 10,000 mAH
Can be loaded during use
2 x 9 V DC outputs for effect pedals, (minus), total 1.2 A
1 x USB 5V 2 mA port for smartphones etc.
1 x Micro USB port
Integrated LED lighting
4-LED battery indicator
3.7V lithium battery
Charging time: approx. 5 hours
Automatic overload protection
Dimensions: 148 x 65 x 17 mm
Weight: 220 g
Includes 1 x USB charging cable, 2x 60 cm DC 9 V cable for effects devices, 1 x 10 cm Polarity DC adapter cable for effects devices and 1 x Daisy-Chain DC cable with 5 outputs for effects devices
https://www.thomann.de/intl/harley_benton_powerplant_powerbank.htm
